Package ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.snakegame.model.snake.ai.impl

Class StayinAliveAISnake

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.snakegame.model.snake.Snake
ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.snakegame.model.snake.ai.AISnake
ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.snakegame.model.snake.ai.impl.StayinAliveAISnake
Direct Known Subclasses:
GreedyAISnake
public class StayinAliveAISnake extends AISnake
An AI-driven snake that doesn't want to die. He only does random movements, trying to avoid collisions with the barrier. Though, if he meets an apple on his way, he will eat it.

    • isNonCollidingTurn

      protected boolean isNonCollidingTurn(SnakeBody snakeBody, Snake.MovingDirection direction)
      Checks if the snake with specified snakeBody will collide with the barrier or its own body if it turns in the given direction.
      Parameters:
      snakeBody - snake to check
      direction - direction to check
      Returns:
      true if the snake won't collide, false otherwise
